channel.title: Join Top-notch Innovative Team - Ventory on Ventory | #1 Solution for Inventory Control
channel.description: Recent content in Join Top-notch Innovative Team - Ventory on Ventory | #1 Solution for Inventory Control

item.title: Enterprise Sales Account Manager (Europe)
item.description: Job Description At Ventory, we are reimagining the Supply Chain industry and the way field stocking locations and critical components are managed. Through its technology platform, Ventory enables enterprises to connect, digitize and control their remote field inventory. Thus, helping them reduce wastage, increase service levels while also help improving their cashflows. Ventory is currently looking for an Enterprise Sales Manager Europe to join its team. In this role you will be responsible to help Ventory gain even more exposure across Europe by doing sales on existing and new enterprise customers.

item.title: Open Application
item.description: Job Description At Ventory, we are revolutionizing how enterprises digitize their supply chains. Our platform enables organizations across multiple industries (Life Sciences & Healthcare, Humanitarian Relief, Solar & Renewables) digitize their field inventory. About You: You are passionate about technology. You love learning and can quickly adapt. You have an affinity towards addressing challenges with innovative solutions, enjoy working with and growing together with a team, and want to play a pivotal role in the success of a young company making an impact.

item.title: Sales Development Representative (Europe)
item.description: Job Description At Ventory, we are reimagining the Supply Chain industry and the way field stocking locations and critical components are managed. Through its technology platform, Ventory enables enterprises to connect, digitize and control their remote field inventory. Thus, helping them reduce wastage, increase service levels while also help improving their cashflows. Ventory today has global partnerships with accounts such as Microsoft, Zebra, Oracle, DHL among others and customers that trust our solution in >20 countries.

item.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
item.description: Job Description At Ventory, we are reimagining the Supply Chain industry and the way field stocking locations and critical components are managed. Through its technology platform, Ventory enables enterprises to connect, digitize and control their remote field inventory. Thus, helping them reduce wastage, increase service levels while also help improving their cashflows. Ventory is currently looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer. Our development team is looking for an experienced Typescript developer that has a strong affinity for Operational focus in deploying, automating.
